content.rendered:
Source: https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/1-8-8-1-16-4-ezcolors.69871/

We use this plugin to make admins chat a different color to everyone else to make them stand out a bit more in chat.

Tested in 1.15.2, 1.16.3, and 1.16.4. Should work with ALL versions 1.8.8+.
Please report ALL BUGS!

EZolors
EZColors is a chat color plugin with a stunning GUI. Including 16 colors, and two rainbow colors to choose from.
With more features coming soon. EZColors is an all in one Chat Color Plugin… FOR FREE!
Added PlaceholderAPI Placeholders!

NEW! Hex Values (1.16+)

Commands

/ezcolors – Opens chat Chat Color GUI.
/ezcolors reload – Reloads the plugin & languages.
/ezcolors languages – Open the Language GUI.
/ezcolors <color> – Set a certain color (supports hex values 1.16+).

Aliases:
/color, /colors, /chatcolor,
/chatcolors, /ezcolor, /colorchat

Placeholders

%ezcolors_color% – Returns the player’s Chat Color.
%ezcolors_color_msg_<msg>% – Returns the message formatted with the player’s color.
%ezcolors_color_set% – Returns True or False depending on if the player has a color set.

Permissions

ezcolors.color.darkred – Permission to set your color to Dark Red.
ezcolors.color.green – Permission to set your color to Green.
ezcolors.color.blue – Permission to set your color to Blue.
ezcolors.color.cyan – Permission to set your color to Cyan.
ezcolors.color.purple – Permission to set your color to Purple.
ezcolors.color.gold – Permission to set your color to Gold.
ezcolors.color.darkgray – Permission to set your color to Dark Gray.
ezcolors.color.red – Permission to set your color to Red.
ezcolors.color.lime – Permission to set your color to Lime.
ezcolors.color.lightblue – Permission to set your color to Light Blue.
ezcolors.color.black – Permission to set your color to Black.
ezcolors.color.pink – Permission to set your color to Pink.
ezcolors.color.yellow – Permission to set your color to Yellow.
ezcolors.color.gray – Permission to set your color to Gray.
ezcolors.color.aqua – Permission to set your color to Aqua.
ezcolors.color.white – Permission to set your color to White.
ezcolors.color.rainbow – Permission to set your color to Rainbow.
ezcolors.color.reset – Permission to reset your color.
ezcolors.color.hex- Permission to set your color to a hex value (1.16+).

ezcolors.gui – Permission to Open the Chat Color GUI.
ezcolors.color.* – Permission to set your color to Any Color.
ezcolors.color.custom – Permissiont to set your color to a Custom Color.
ezcolors.reload – Permission to reload the plugin. (Execute /color reload)
ezcolors.languages – Permission to open the Languages GUI (Execute /color languages)

ezcolors.showlanguage – Shows the languages item in the gui.
ezcolors.showrainbow – Shows the rainbow item in the gui.

ezcolors.* – Permission to everything.

Pictures

Videos
